name: Bruce Barfield
description: Loving caring, passionate, compassionate, trust worthy, humble, Genuine man that loves to do things that please my partner make her happy, I love Bowling, cooking, swimming beach walking spending time with my son, I am a very warm, extremely affectionate and very caring Man who is not afraid to either show or express in many ways, those feelings., I am still hopeful that I can find that woman. Could she be you?
